title: Cloud Deploy - Deploy to custom target types
abstract:
# Cloud Deploy - Deploy to custom target types
**    Preview     ** This product is subject to the "Pre-GA Offerings Terms" in the General Service Terms section   of the [Service Specific Terms](/terms/service-terms#1) .     Pre-GA products are available "as is" and might have limited support.    For more information, see the [launch stage descriptions](/products#product-launch-stages) .
In addition to deploying to any of the supported target types, (Google Kubernetes Engine, Cloud Run GKE Enterprise), you can use Cloud Deploy to deploy to custom targets.
A custom target is a Cloud Deploy target that deploys to a runtime or an output that is not one of the standard, supported target types.
The article [About custom targets](/deploy/docs/custom-targets) describes custom targets and how you can use them in a Cloud Deploy delivery pipeline.
content:
## What's next
- [Learn more about custom targets and how they work](/deploy/docs/custom-targets) .
- [Learn how to define custom target types and use them in your delivery pipeline](/deploy/docs/create-custom-target) .
- [Learn how to create delivery pipelines and targets](/deploy/docs/create-pipeline-targets) .
- [Try a Cloud Deploy quickstart](/deploy/docs/deploy/docs/quickstarts) .
